suggestions.why: List.contains() inside a loop is O(n²). Replace List with Set for O(1) lookup.

suggestions.why: Manual index scan inside loop is O(n). Using Set/Map gives O(1) lookup.

suggestions.recommendedDataStructure: Use HashMap/HashSet for matching instead of O(n²) nested scans.
suggestions.why: Nested loops cause O(n²) complexity. Converting one list to a Map reduces time to O(n).

suggestions.why: List indexing ability is wasted when never used; Set is faster & lighter.
suggestions.energyImpact: Lower memory footprint and O(1) lookups.
